directions: In a large, heavy skillet over medium heat combine textured vegetable protein, mushroom soup, mushrooms, onion, garlic powder, seasoning salt, water, oats and olive oil.  Stir until ingredients are well mixed, oats are moist and soup is dissolved.  Reduce heat to low and simmer until thickened, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Easy Vegetarian Stroganoff
